overview:
Caldera Investment Group is a boutique investment firm that provides advisory services to early stage, emerging, and middle market companies. The firm advises on strategic corporate transactions including mergers and acquisitions, divestitures, restructurings, and capital raising activities. Caldera also conducts venture capital activities including making direct investments in seed-stage companies through its venture affiliates. Caldera Investment Group has a robust investment management business through its affiliate, Caldera Advisors, LLC, where it manages a private investment fund and provides investment advisory services to high net-worth individuals and institutions.

Led by the firmâ€™s founder, Neal Goyal, Caldera was established on the belief that there was an opportunity within the small cap and emerging market for a firm to create value in young growing companies that have the desire to go to the next level. Through its broad expertise and network base, Caldera pushes its professionals to think creatively and structure transactions that benefit these growing companies so that they can continue to strive for the missions they set out to achieve. The firm operates on the belief that to maintain a standard of excellence in their core businesses, they must provide clients with service that exceeds expectations with the highest caliber of professionalism.
